content:
NotifyCollectionChangedAction Enum

Definition

Describes the action that caused a CollectionChanged event.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TypeForwardedFrom("WindowsBase, Version=3.0.0.0, Culture=Neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35")]
public enum NotifyCollectionChangedAction
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
NotifyCollectionChangedAction

Fields

Add

An item was added to the collection.
Move

An item was moved within the collection.
Remove

An item was removed from the collection.
Replace

An item was replaced in the collection.
Reset

The content of the collection was cleared.
